name: insta-toc
description: Simultaneously generate, update, and maintain a table of contents for your notes.

scripts.dev:log: node esbuild.config.mjs logger && terser -o dist/dev/main.js dist/dev/main.js
scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && terser -o dist/build/main.js dist/build/main.js
scripts.upload:patch: npm version patch -m "Automated bump to %s" && npm run bump-version && npm run build && git add . && VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git commit -m "Update for version $VERSION" && git push origin --follow-tags
scripts.upload:minor: npm version minor -m "Automated bump to %s" && npm run bump-version && npm run build && git add . && VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git commit -m "Update for version $VERSION" && git push origin --follow-tags
scripts.upload:major: npm version major -m "Automated bump to %s" && npm run bump-version && npm run build && git add . && VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git commit -m "Update for version $VERSION" && git push origin --follow-tags

author: Nick C.
